name: Good Boy... just very hungry
description:
Controls on keyboard:

  • Arrow keys - move
  • X - left action (shown on screen)
  • C - right action (shown on screen)
  • M - mute music

Also should work wit controllers/gamepads.

Credits:

  • Sounds: Trix
  • Music: Avgvsta, gheja
  • Small font: Brian Swetland
  • Big font: Eeeve Somepx
  • Code, graphics: gheja

The game is made in Godot, using the great template by Trix: https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources
